00026 W.Oracle = function(args){var self = this;
00027   // not from the darwin module inclusion
00028   if(!W.darwin) W.darwin = {oracles:[]};
00029   this.id = W.darwin.oracles.length;
00030   this.worlds = [];
00031   this.isClockShown = false;
00032 
00033   // register autorun func.
00034   W.event(window, 'onload', init);
00035   // register this instance to the darwin's oracle pool
00036   W.darwin.oracles[this.id] = this;
00037 
00041   function init(){
00042     // append worlds' presentation layer
00043     for(var i = 0; i < self.worlds.length; ++i){
00044       var world = self.worlds[i];
00045       world.time = 0;
00046       world.ticks = 0;
00047       if(!world.delay)
00048         world.delay = 0;
00049       if(world.body)
00050         W.body.appendChild(world.body);
00051     }
00052     // tick the worlds registered in oracle
00053     self.run();
00054   };
00055 
00056   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00057   for(var i in args)
00058     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00059 };

00068 W.Oracle.prototype.add = function(world){
00069   this.worlds[this.worlds.length] = world;
00070   world.oracle = this;
00071 };
00072 
00076 W.Oracle.prototype.run = function(){
00077   var world;
00078   for(var i = 0; i < this.worlds.length; ++i){
00079     world = this.worlds[i];
00080     if(!world.stop){
00081       if(world.ticks == world.delay){
00082         // run tick()
00083         if(world.tick)
00084           world.tick();
00085         // update clock
00086         if(this.isClockShown)
00087           world.clock.innerHTML = ++world.time;
00088         // init. ticks
00089         world.ticks = 0;
00090       }else ++world.ticks;
00091     }
00092   }
00093   setTimeout('W.darwin.oracles['+ this.id +'].run()', 0);
00094 };
00095 
00096 
00100 W.Oracle.prototype.stop = function(){
00101   var world;
00102   for(var i = 0; i < this.worlds.length; ++i){
00103     world = this.worlds[i];
00104     world.stop = true;
00105   }
00106 };

00114 W.Oracle.prototype.showClock = function(isOn){var self = this;
00115   // handle the case executing this method before adding any world
00116   if(this.worlds.length == 0){
00117     W.event(window, 'onload', clock_on_off);
00118   }else clock_on_off();
00119 
00120   function clock_on_off(){
00121     for(var i = 0; i < self.worlds.length; ++i){
00122       var world = self.worlds[i];
00123       // no body, no clock
00124       if(world.body){
00125         if(isOn){
00126           if(!world.clock){
00127             world.clock = W.style('div', 'color:lime;fontSize:11px;display:none');
00128             world.body.appendChild(world.clock);
00129           }
00130           world.clock.style.display = 'block';
00131           self.isClockShown = true;
00132         }else{
00133           world.clock.style.display = 'none';
00134           self.isClockShown = false;
00135         }
00136       }
00137     }
00138   };
00139 };
